# dhis2r

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of dhis2r is to provide a wrapper for the Dhis2 web api in R

## Installation

You can install the development version of dhis2r from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pearldatafirm/dhis2r")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a get data from a Dhis2 instance.

```{r example}
#library(dhis2r)
## basic example code
```
